recommendations.title: Replace Mock Database with Real Database
recommendations.description: The current implementation uses in-memory Map storage instead of a real database
recommendations.action: Implement PostgreSQL or SQLite database with Prisma ORM

recommendations.title: Complete Implementation of Business Logic
recommendations.description: Several business workflows have TODO comments or incomplete implementations
recommendations.action: Review and complete all business logic implementations

recommendations.title: Implement Complete Security Framework
recommendations.description: Missing security headers, authentication issues, or hardcoded credentials
recommendations.action: Implement comprehensive security measures including CORS, CSP, rate limiting

nextSteps.title: CRITICAL: Replace Mock Database Implementation
nextSteps.description: Implement real PostgreSQL database with proper schema and migrations
